rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable Associated Persons.APID

classVariables.description: Identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons. If APID identifies a pool, POOLDEF records must exist for each associated person.
classVariables.label: Associated Persons Identifier
classVariables.name: APID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable Associated Persons.RSUBJID

classVariables.description: Identifier for a related study subject or pool of study subjects. The subject(s) may be human or animal. RSUBJID will be populated with the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool. RSUBJID will be null for data about associated persons who are related to the study but not to any of the study subjects.
classVariables.label: Related Subject
classVariables.name: RSUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable Associated Persons.RDEVID

classVariables.description: Identifier for a related device. RDEVID will be populated with the SPDEVID of the related device
classVariables.label: Related Device
classVariables.name: RDEVID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable Associated Persons.SREL

classVariables.description: If RSUBJID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RSUBJID. If RDEVID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the device identified in RDEVID. If RSUBJID and RDEVID are null, SREL describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the study identified in STUDYID.
classVariables.label: Subject, Device, or Study Relationship
classVariables.name: SREL

self.title: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects

parentDataset.title: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.STUDYID

parentDataset.title: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.APID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons. If APID identifies a pool, POOLDEF records must exist for each associated person.
datasetVariables.label: Associated Persons Identifier
datasetVariables.name: APID

parentDataset.title: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.RSUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier for a related subject or pool of subjects. RSUBJID may be populated with the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool. RSUBJID will be null for data about associated persons who are related to the study but not to any study subjects.
datasetVariables.label: Related Subject or Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: RSUBJID

parentDataset.title: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.RDEVID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier for a related device. RDEVID will be populated with the SPDEVID of the related device.
datasetVariables.label: Related Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: RDEVID

parentDataset.title: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.SREL

datasetVariables.description: If RSUBJID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RSUBJID. If RDEVID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RDEVID. If RSUBJID and RDEVID are null, SREL describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the study identified in STUDYID.
datasetVariables.label: Subject, Device, or Study Relationship
datasetVariables.name: SREL

datasets.description: A dataset used to represent relationships between associated persons (individuals who are not study subjects, but about whom data is collected) and study subjects. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C147175, 2018-06-29)
datasets.label: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects
datasets.name: APRELSUB

description: Associated Persons (AP) are persons who can be associated with a study, a particular study subject or a device used in the study. An AP may or may not have a familial relationship to a study subject. AP domains are created using SDTM variables, with the application of specific AP rules.  (Source: SDTM v1.4, Section 5.1)
label: Associated Persons
name: Associated Persons
